name: Runaway Bride
description: Keiko Ishikawa vanishes only seconds before she was to become Keiko O'Brien, and Miles O'Brien is suspicious of the circumstances. Are there more nefarious forces at work here than simple cold feet?
rules:
-- Unique Bajoran, Section 31, and Terran Empire Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Keiko, Braxton, O'Brien, or crew with the Romantic trait will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Keiko, Braxton, O'Brien, or Romantic
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: O'Brien
featured_crew.flavor: Working undercover for Starfleet Intelligence, O'Brien was ordered to investigate the Orion Syndicate.

screens.text: "Traveling through time, our future lives on Deep Space Nine... it's all too much. I just can't do this, knowing what I know. I'm sorry, Miles."

"And that's the last I heard from her. Found in an instant, lost in another. She isn't the only version of my wife in this timeline, but I can't stand the thought of any version of her lost and alone."

"I know one man's marriage doesn't seem important in the grand scheme of things, and I don't delude myself about my own importance... but what if there's a ripple effect here? What might have happened if I had never married Keiko?"
